_description: Defines validation rules for lead attributes. Attributes are validated against these rules during transformation. Invalid optional attributes are omitted (permissive handling).

_attribute_types.dropdown: Must match one of the specified values exactly

_validation_behavior.required_fields: phone and product.name are required. Missing values cause FAILED status.
_validation_behavior.optional_attributes: Invalid values are omitted from customer payload (permissive handling).

solar_offer_type.description: Type of solar offer (Both, Rent, Buy)

solar_owner.description: Solar panel ownership status (Yes, No, In Progress)

solar_power_storage.description: Power storage interest (Yes, No, Not sure yet)

solar_property_type.description: Property type (Single-family house, Two-family house, Multi-family house, Commercial building, Open land, Garage, Carport, Barn/Agriculture, Warehouse, Industrial)

solar_roof_age.description: Roof age (In planning, Just built, Younger than 30 years, Older than 30 years)

solar_roof_condition.description: Roof condition (Asbestos-contaminated, Freshly renovated, Good condition, Okay, Needs renovation, New construction)

solar_roof_material.description: Roof material (Asbestos, Bitumen, Metal/Trapezoidal sheet, Roof tiles, Green roof, Wooden roof, Gravel, Slate, Shingle roof, Other)

solar_roof_type.description: Roof type (Other, Flat roof, Coffee mill house, Hipped gable roof, Mansard roof, Shed roof, Gable roof, Offset shed roof, Hipped roof, Angled hipped roof, Gable roof with dormer)

solar_south_location.description: South-facing location (Yes, No, Partially, Not sure, None (flat roof), South, South-West, South-East, West, East)

solar_usage.description: Solar usage type (Self-consumption, Grid feed-in, Grid feed-in and self-consumption)

solar_area.description: Available roof area in square meters
